ActivityMetadata.Name: TY Favorite a Secret
ActivityMetadata.Label: TY Favorite a Secret
ActivityMetadata.Description: Used to favorite or unfavorite an individual Secret
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Thycotic

Favorite a Secret

Used to favorite or unfavorite an individual Secret

Method: Post

OperationID: SecretsService_Favorite

EndPoint:

/secrets/{secretId}/favorite
